Function	Component of a complex required to localize phosphatidylinositol 4-kinase (PI4K) to the plasma membrane (PubMed:23229899, PubMed:24417819). In the complex, plays a central role in bridging PI4KA to EFR3B and HYCC1, via direct interactions (By similarity).
